attributes.action: Larger pay rise for nhs workers .
attributes.additional_details: Give our NHS workers more wages and let them know the country is thinking of them.
attributes.background: NHS has saved so many lives -and lost colleagues and family -working through the pandemic to save our country they deserve a pay rise or a lump sum of money to say thank you.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
